reviewDescription: It promises AI. Using OpenAI Whisper on GPT, I was sure that this paid app of Wisprflow was at least that good. But its not. It keeps all placeholders, does not have any context (like the email thread), so its pretty useless. GPT is for free and so much better. Please let me know when you have real AI enabled.

So far, a pretty cool thing to:
1. Improve your English level if you are another native speaker because you're starting not typing but saying something and thinking about the wording itself, and it's pretty cool.
2. Text with somebody much faster and in the proper way because it also does all the grammatical stuff and aligns with your writing habits.

reviewTitle: Not one single glitch worthy to get angry at.
reviewDescription: I am writing this review with Wispr Flow.... Not one single glitch.

Absolute game changer, and for £12 a month, it's an absolute no-brainer. The time this saves typing is worth way more than the price. It's fast, it's responsive, got nice easy keyboard shortcuts. Nothing not to like.

reviewTitle: It makes my life way easier saves me…
reviewDescription: It makes my life way easier saves me time and is incredibly inexpensive. Love it. It isn’t 100% perfect, but I can truly recommend it to everyone who likes speaking more

reviewTitle: This is a great app when it works
reviewDescription: This is a great app when it works. Put your cursor in any text box, press two keys on the keyboard, and start talking. If you make a mistake or repeat yourself, Wispr Flow recognizes that, and your dictation is corrected. It's awesome. So, why the 3-star review and not a 5-star review? Sometimes, when you dictate, you may not get the dictation for 20-30 seconds or at all. This tends to be the case when you have a longer dictation and you are in part of the day that might be busier for their servers.

reviewTitle: Glitchy, no reaction from support, not usable
reviewDescription:
First it was fine, however, it started glitching to the point where i cannot use it. Support doesn't reply, cancelled my subscription and have to use another tool even though i paid for the whole month ahead few days ago
cant recommend
The product was promising, but the support is unable to respond to requests. I don't pay for a product if the support is terrible.

reviewTitle: I upgraded to Pro on the 8 Aug 2025 at…
reviewDescription: This is an amazing product that has made me so much more productive. My only issue is the keyboard switch itself off and it took me a couple of days to figure this out.

reviewTitle: I don't understand why people talk…
reviewDescription: I don't understand why people talk better about his company. This review is being written with Wispr Flow, and it's an amazing platform for saving time. I can speak very fast and get things done much much faster, especially writing documents - it's incredible. Highly suggest it.

reviewTitle: no custemer support - full of bugs - do not pay for subscription
reviewDescription: At first, it was a game-changer for me, but then the bugs started reaching in. Suddenly, after I stopped talking, it didn't paste. Trying everything, the shortcuts that are provided by them aren't working. I have the team subscription, and one of the features of the team's subscription is that you get support within one business day, which is simply a lie. It's been now a few days, and I'm trying to reach out to them. My team and I are having simple bugs, and it doesn't work like it should. I'm not able to use it more than a week, and there is no one to talk to although I extra paid for support within one business day.

reviewTitle: I would have given 5 stars or 4…
reviewDescription:
I would have given 5 stars or 4 because, although we find it difficult to insert punctuation, I have to give it 2 because it has been a week since I started having problems. I have written several emails and made reports. They are probably trying to fix it because yesterday I saw a slight improvement, but in reality, even with the paid subscription I took out, I have not been able to use the product for over a week.
Like all start-ups, they obviously don't have a minimum number of staff or anyone who can respond or a contact person who can give you guarantees. It may all be done with artificial intelligence or in a “fantasy world” that no one knows about, and you have no chance of getting in touch with someone who can solve the problem.

reviewTitle: Sign in email doesn't arrive and no replies from customer support
reviewDescription: Initial sign up confirmation email first came hours later outside expiry window, second attempt didnt arrive. No replies from customer support about the issue even days later.
This app only works intermittently. It is full of bugs. Support is almost non-existent. Don’t pay for the Pro version, you're wasting your money.

reviewTitle: This has been a game changer for me
reviewDescription: This has been a game changer for me. I just hit the fn button on my MacBook, talk, and it does 100x better than the voice to text ever did. I have no idea how many hours a day it saves me.
